hero_title: I-craftfitecture 路 路 路 路 khanda
hero_text: Ukuyila iindawo ezingenakufane, ukudibanisa abantu, izakhiwo kunye neemvakalelo ngolwimi lwezinto eziluncedo.
contact_hours: Iiyure zeOfisi: NgoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesihlanu, 9:00 AM-5:00 PM
projects_subtitle: Jonga umsebenzi wethu wakutshanje kunye nokuhlolwa
project2_title: Uvavanyo olusemgangathweni: Imbono yobungcali kwi-YC Lee Advietct
about_subtitle: Eyona nkonzo iphambili ePerak, i-Pearle, eKeda, iYohor, noKala Lumpur, kwaye senza neeprojekthi zaphesheya.
philosophy_text: Uyilo lungaphezulu kwesakhiwo kunye nendawo-yingxoxo phakathi kwabantu nakwindawo esingqongileyo. Sijonge ekuyileni izithuba ezilinganisa ngokulula, ubuhle, kunye nexesha.
mission_text: Sizibophelele ekudaleni uyilo oluhlanganisa ukusebenza kunye ne-aesthetics. Kwizixhobo zokwenza izinto, zonke iinkcukacha ziqinisekisa ukuba iprojekthi nganye ixelela ibali layo elikhethekileyo.
team_text: Iqela lethu linenkathalo yoyilo kunye nabayili abavela kwizifundo ezahlukeneyo, besebenza kunye ukubonelela ngobungcali, ubuchule, kunye nezisombululo ezizinzileyo zeprojekthi nganye.
